Source.Name: haskell-ansi-wl-pprint
Source.Summary: This is a pretty printing library based on Wadler's paper A Prettier Printer. It has been enhanced with support for ANSI terminal colored output using the ansi-terminal package.
Source.Description: This is a pretty printing library based on Wadler's paper A Prettier Printer. It has been enhanced with support for ANSI terminal colored output using the ansi-terminal package.
